input.sentences: the walls were freshly painted with murals .
the ministers clothing was on display .
the church is ready for the grand ceremony that is to come .
output.sentences: Martin Luther King day is a widely celebrated day by many.
There are even murals depicting what took place all those years ago.
There are museums that hold many historical pieces from this time, including the robes that Martin Luther King himself wore.
As you walk, you can even see the tomb of Mr. King.
The church he held many of his sermons at is also available for public viewing.
